CCI: Cropland, rainfed / Tree or shrub cover
Name: Cropland

CCI: Mosaic cropland (>50%) / natural vegetation (tree, shrub, herbaceous
Name: Mosaic cropland

CCI: Mosaic natural vegetation (tree, shrub, herbaceous cover) (>50%) / cropland (<50%)
Name: Mosaic natural

CCI: Tree cover, broadleaved, evergreen, Closed to open (>15%)
Name: Evergreen broadleaf

CCI: Tree cover, broadleaved, deciduous, Closed to open (>15%)
Name: Deciduous broadleaf

CCI: Tree cover, needleleaved, evergreen, closed to open (>15%)
Name: Evergreen needleleaf

CCI: Tree cover, needleleaved, deciduous, closed to open (>15%)
Name: Deciduous needleleaf

CCI: Tree cover, mixed leaf type (broadleaved and needleleaved)
Name: Mixed forest

CCI: Mosaic tree and shrub (>50%) / herbaceous cover (<50%)
Name: Mosaic woody

CCI: Mosaic herbaceous cover (>50%) / tree and shrub (<50%)
Name: Mosaic herbaceous

CCI: Sparse vegetation (tree, shrub, herbaceous cover) (<15%) / Sparse shrub (<15%)
Name: Sparse woody + shrub

CCI: Sparse vegetation (tree, shrub, herbaceous cover) (<15%) / Sparse herbaceous cover (<15%)
Name: Sparse woody + herb

CCI: Tree cover, flooded, fresh or brakish water
Name: Wetland forest

CCI: Shrub or herbaceous cover, flooded, fresh/saline/brakish water
Name: Wetland shrub
